I have pcos.  Started on metformin on september 2013. And got pregnant same month but had a miscarriage... well but now at least i have a normal period and i ovulate regularly. I also lost 15 lbs since meformins helps with that and i feel great. If i dont get pregnant in 3 months i will try clomid.
